trans-unit.source: Provides a property, event, and methods for interacting with the network to which the computer is connected.
trans-unit.target: 提供用於與電腦所連接之網路互動的屬性、事件和方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Network` object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Network`物件。

trans-unit.source: To
trans-unit.target: 以

trans-unit.source: See
trans-unit.target: 請參閱

trans-unit.target: 上傳的檔案

trans-unit.source: [How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：上傳檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)

trans-unit.source: Download a file
trans-unit.target: 下載檔案

trans-unit.source: [How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：下載檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)

trans-unit.source: Check connection status
trans-unit.target: 請檢查連線狀態

trans-unit.source: [How to: Check Connection Status](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：檢查連接狀態](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status.md)

trans-unit.source: This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中將檔案上傳`Order.txt`至http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Downloads the specified remote file and saves it in the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 下載指定的遠端檔案，並儲存於指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: Path of the file to download, including file name and host address.
trans-unit.target: 要下載的檔案其路徑，包含檔名和主機位址。

trans-unit.source: File name and path of the downloaded file.
trans-unit.target: 已下載之檔案的檔名及路徑。

trans-unit.source: Downloads the specified remote file and saves it in the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 下載指定的遠端檔案，並儲存於指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the destination file already exists, the `DownloadFile` method will not overwrite the existing file.
trans-unit.target: 如果目的地檔案已經存在，`DownloadFile`方法不會覆寫現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the other overloads of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.DownloadFile%2A> method to instruct it to overwrite existing files, provide user credentials, or specify a specific timeout value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其中一個其他多載的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.DownloadFile%2A>方法，以指示它覆寫現有檔案，提供使用者認證，或指定特定的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: `DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: `DownloadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: `DownloadFile`方法不會傳送指定的 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing.
trans-unit.target: 如果選擇性的使用者代理程式標頭遺失，某些伺服器可能會傳回 500 （內部伺服器錯誤）。

trans-unit.source: To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳送選擇性標頭，您必須建構要求使用<xref:System.Net.WebClient>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會將檔案下載`WineList.txt`從`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`並將它儲存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`。

trans-unit.source: This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會將檔案下載`WineList.txt`從`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`並將它儲存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`，指定 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationFileName" /> 以斜線結束。

trans-unit.source: The server does not respond within the default timeout (100 seconds).
trans-unit.target: 伺服器沒有在預設的逾時 (100 秒) 內回應。

trans-unit.source: User lacks necessary permissions to perform a network operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者缺乏執行網路作業的必要權限。

trans-unit.source: The request is denied by the target web server.
trans-unit.target: 目標 Web 伺服器拒絕該要求。

trans-unit.source: Downloads the specified remote file and saves it in the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 下載指定的遠端檔案，並儲存於指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`showUI`設`True`，對話方塊會出現並顯示作業的進度; 此對話方塊包含**取消**可用來取消作業的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊中不是強制回應，並因此不會封鎖使用者輸入其他程式中的視窗。

trans-unit.source: If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器沒有回應內指定`connectionTimeout`、 取消的作業，並擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: `DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: `DownloadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: `DownloadFile`方法不會傳送指定的 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing.
trans-unit.target: 如果選擇性的使用者代理程式標頭遺失，某些伺服器可能會傳回 500 （內部伺服器錯誤）。

trans-unit.source: To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳送選擇性標頭，您必須建構要求使用<xref:System.Net.WebClient>類別。

trans-unit.source: The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: FTP 通訊協定傳送的資訊，包括以純文字密碼，並不應該使用以傳輸機密資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`showUI`設`True`，對話方塊會出現並顯示作業的進度; 此對話方塊包含**取消**可用來取消作業的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊中不是強制回應，並因此不會封鎖使用者輸入其他程式中的視窗。

trans-unit.source: If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器沒有回應內指定`connectionTimeout`、 取消的作業，並擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: `DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: `DownloadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: `DownloadFile`方法不會傳送指定的 HTTP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing.
trans-unit.target: 如果選擇性的使用者代理程式標頭遺失，某些伺服器可能會傳回 500 （內部伺服器錯誤）。

trans-unit.source: To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the <xref:System.Net.WebClient> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳送選擇性標頭，您必須建構要求使用<xref:System.Net.WebClient>類別。

trans-unit.source: The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: FTP 通訊協定傳送的資訊，包括以純文字密碼，並不應該使用以傳輸機密資訊。

trans-unit.target: 如果電腦連接至網路，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: `IsAvailable` always returns `False` when called from a `Click Once` application or if the user does not have <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission>.
trans-unit.target: `IsAvailable` 一律傳回`False`從呼叫時`Click Once`應用程式，或如果使用者沒有<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationPermission>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Network.IsAvailable` property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.Network.IsAvailable`屬性。

trans-unit.source: To
trans-unit.target: 以

trans-unit.source: See
trans-unit.target: 請參閱

trans-unit.source: Check whether a computer is connected to a network
trans-unit.target: 檢查電腦是否連接到網路

trans-unit.source: [How to: Check Connection Status](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：檢查連接狀態](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status.md)

trans-unit.source: This example checks the property's status and reports it.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會檢查該屬性的狀態，並將它報告。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Controls rights to access HTTP Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: 控制對 HTTP 網際網路資源存取的權限。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the network availability changes.
trans-unit.target: 當網路可用性變更時發生。

trans-unit.source: An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式引發`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件每次變更網路的可用性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs.IsNetworkAvailable%2A> property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs.IsNetworkAvailable%2A>屬性`e`參數，以取得新的網路連線狀態。

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的網路連線的目前狀態，請使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application, this event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Form 應用程式中，會引發這個事件與其他使用者介面事件的應用程式的主執行緒上。

trans-unit.source: This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓應用程式的使用者介面直接存取此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果應用程式忙碌處理另一個使用者介面事件時都會引發這個事件，此事件無法處理直到完成其他事件處理常式，或呼叫<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.DoEvents%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the `Handles` statement to handle the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event; you must use the `AddHandler` statement.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用`Handles`陳述式來處理`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件，您必須使用`AddHandler`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Forms applications, the `MyApplication` object exposes a `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event that provides the same functionality as this event, but you can handle it with the `Handles` statement.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Forms 應用程式，`MyApplication`物件會公開`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件提供以相同的功能，為此事件，但您可以處理使用`Handles`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Many network hubs provide a network connection, even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network.
trans-unit.target: 許多網路集線器提供網路連線，即使較大的網路連線中斷的中樞。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates a change in the connection between the computer and a hub.
trans-unit.target: 因此，對於有線連線，此事件表示電腦與中心之間的連線中的變更。

trans-unit.source: The `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event is not raised by applications that run on Windows 95 and Windows 98 or by applications that are run on Windows 2000 by a non-administrator.
trans-unit.target: `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` Windows 95 及 Windows 98 執行的應用程式或由非系統管理員在 Windows 2000 執行的應用程式不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If your application might run on those platforms, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式可能會在這些平台上執行，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event to update the user interface of a form or control.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged`更新的表單或控制項的使用者介面的事件。

trans-unit.source: This code should to be in a form or control that has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> named `Label1`.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼應該要在表單或控制項具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>名為`Label1`。

trans-unit.source: Pings the specified server.
trans-unit.target: Ping 指定的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The URL, computer name, or IP number of the server to ping.
trans-unit.target: 要 Ping 之伺服器的 URL、電腦名稱或 IP 編號。

trans-unit.source: Pings the specified server.
trans-unit.target: Ping 指定的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the operation was successful; otherwise <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業成功，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: The `Ping` method is not a fail-safe method for determining the availability of a remote computer: the ping port on the target computer may be turned off or the ping request may be blocked by a firewall or router.
trans-unit.target: `Ping`方法不是保全的方法，來判斷遠端電腦的可用性： 目標電腦上的 ping 通訊埠可能已關閉，或者防火牆或路由器已封鎖 ping 要求。

trans-unit.source: The address passed to the `Ping` method must be DNS resolvable and cannot be preceded by "http://".
trans-unit.target: 位址傳遞至`Ping`方法必須為可解析的 DNS，並無法加上"http://"。

trans-unit.source: This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returns `True`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會報告是否可以 ping 伺服器，判斷是否`Ping`方法會傳回`True`。

trans-unit.source: Replace `"198.01.01.01"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping.
trans-unit.target: 取代`"198.01.01.01"`ping 伺服器 IP 位址、 URL 或電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returned `True` and specifies a timeout interval of 1000 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會報告是否可以 ping 伺服器，判斷是否`Ping`方法會傳回`True`，並指定 1000年毫秒的逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: Replace `"www.cohowinery.com"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping.
trans-unit.target: 取代`"www.cohowinery.com"`ping 伺服器 IP 位址、 URL 或電腦名稱。

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Controls access to network information and traffic statistics for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 控制對本機電腦之網路資訊及流量統計資料的存取。

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInformationAccess.Ping" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified file to the specified host address.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的檔案傳送到指定的主機位址。

trans-unit.source: You can use one of the other overloads of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.UploadFile%2A> method to provide user credentials or specify a specific timeout value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用其中一個其他多載的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.UploadFile%2A>方法，以提供使用者認證，或指定特定的逾時值。

trans-unit.source: `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中將檔案上傳`Order.txt`至`http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`。

trans-unit.source: This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會在未提供使用者名稱或密碼的情況下將 `Order.txt` 檔案上傳至 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`、顯示上傳進度，並具有 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to display progress of the operation; otherwise <see langword="False" />.

trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Timeout interval in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Default is 100 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100 秒。

trans-unit.source: If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box shows the progress of the operation and includes a **Cancel** button that the user can click to cancel the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`showUI`設`True`，對話方塊會顯示作業的進度，並包含**取消**使用者可以按一下以取消作業的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Because the dialog box is not modal, it does not block user input to other windows in the program.
trans-unit.target: 不強制回應對話方塊中，因為它不會封鎖使用者輸入其他程式中的視窗。

trans-unit.source: If the server does not respond within the interval specified in `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器沒有回應中指定的間隔內`connectionTimeout`、 作業取消並擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[啟用網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: FTP 通訊協定傳送的資訊，包括以純文字密碼，並不應該使用以傳輸機密資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的工作，包含範例`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile`方法。

trans-unit.source: To
trans-unit.target: 以

trans-unit.source: See
trans-unit.target: 請參閱

trans-unit.source: Upload a file
trans-unit.target: 上傳的檔案

trans-unit.source: [How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何：上傳檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)

trans-unit.source: This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中將檔案上傳`Order.txt`至`http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`。

trans-unit.source: This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會在未提供使用者名稱或密碼的情況下將 `Order.txt` 檔案上傳至 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`、顯示上傳進度，並具有 500 毫秒的逾時間隔。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connectionTimeout" /> is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connectionTimeout" /> 小於或等於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> does not include a file name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 不含檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: User lacks necessary permissions to perform a network operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者缺乏執行網路作業的必要權限。

trans-unit.source: The server does not respond within the specified <paramref name="connectionTimeout" />.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器沒有在指定的 <paramref name="connectionTimeout" /> 內回應。

trans-unit.source: The request is denied by the target web server.
trans-unit.target: 目標 Web 伺服器拒絕該要求。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 控制相關使用者介面和剪貼簿的權限。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: Controls rights to access HTTP Internet resources.
trans-unit.target: 控制對 HTTP 網際網路資源存取的權限。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Path and name of file to upload.
trans-unit.target: 要上載的檔案其路徑和名稱。

trans-unit.source: URL, IP address, or URI of destination server.
trans-unit.target: 目的伺服器的 URL、IP 位址或 URI。

trans-unit.source: User name to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Default is an empty string: <c>""</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串：<c>""</c>。

trans-unit.source: Password to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Default is an empty string: <c>""</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串：<c>""</c>。

trans-unit.source: Whether to display progress of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 是否顯示作業的進度。

trans-unit.source: Default is <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Timeout interval in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 逾時間隔 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Default is 100 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100 秒。

trans-unit.source: Action to be taken when the user clicks **Cancel**.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下 [取消] 時所要採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: Default is <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.UICancelOption.ThrowException" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see cref="F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.UICancelOption.ThrowException" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the specified file to the specified host address.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的檔案傳送到指定的主機位址。

trans-unit.source: If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box shows the progress of the operation and includes a **Cancel** button that the user can click to cancel the operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果`showUI`設`True`，對話方塊會顯示作業的進度，並包含**取消**使用者可以按一下以取消作業的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Because the dialog box is not modal, it does not block user input to other windows in the program.
trans-unit.target: 不強制回應對話方塊中，因為它不會封鎖使用者輸入其他程式中的視窗。

trans-unit.source: If the server does not respond within the interval specified in `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器沒有回應中指定的間隔內`connectionTimeout`、 作業取消並擲回例外狀況。
